author: jroloff
body:
#### PR description:

This PR fixes a problem with local tests of Sherpa, where the Sherpack location did not use the specified path to find the Sherpack. This only affects local tests, and should not have any impact on production.

#### PR validation:

I have tested that this is able to find the correct path to the Sherpack location. 

Tagging @bbilin and @lviliani  for their information.
title: Fixing sherpack location finder for local case
